Package org.tinyradius.packet

Class AccessRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinyradius.packet.RadiusPacket
      • org.tinyradius.packet.AccessRequest
  • public class AccessRequest
extends RadiusPacket
    This class represents an Access-Request Radius packet.

      • verifyPassword

        public boolean verifyPassword​(java.lang.String plaintext)
                       throws RadiusException
        Verifies that the passed plain-text password matches the password (hash) send with this Access-Request packet. Works with both PAP and CHAP.
        Parameters:
        plaintext - password to verify packet against
        Returns:
        true if the password is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        RadiusException - password verification failed or not supported for auth protocol

      • decodeRequestAttributes

        protected void decodeRequestAttributes​(java.lang.String sharedSecret)
                                throws RadiusException
        Decrypts the User-Password attribute.
        Overrides:
        decodeRequestAttributes in class RadiusPacket
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - used for decoding
        Throws:
        RadiusException - malformed packet

      • encodeRequest

        protected AccessRequest encodeRequest​(java.lang.String sharedSecret)
                               throws RadiusException
        Description copied from class: RadiusPacket
        Encode request and generate authenticator if required.

        AccountingRequest/CoA/DisconnectRequest overrides this method to create a hash authenticator as per RFC 2866.

        AccessRequest overrides this method to generate a randomized authenticator as per RFC 2865 and encode required attributes (i.e. User-Password).

        Base implementation in RadiusPacket generates randomized authenticator as used by Access-Request/Status-Server. As more packet types are supported, consider changing the default encodeRequest() method.

        Overrides:
        encodeRequest in class RadiusPacket
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - shared secret that secures the communication with the other Radius server/client
        Throws:
        RadiusException - malformed packet

      • encodeRequestAttributes

        protected java.util.List<RadiusAttribute> encodeRequestAttributes​(byte[] newAuthenticator,
                                                                  java.lang.String sharedSecret)
                                                           throws RadiusException
        Sets and encrypts the User-Password attribute.
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - shared secret that secures the communication with the other Radius server/client
        Throws:
        RadiusException - auth protocol not supported
